Design-01.Description: Design Style 01: is a Solid stripe, one color style.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02: is a Solid stripe with a pinstripe accent. The 'accent' (red in image) can be cut away, or an alternate accent color.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03: is a Solid stripe style with a lower pinstripe accent. The accent (red in image) can be cut away, or an alternate accent color.

Design-04.Description: Design Style 04: is a Strobed stripe style and is a single color.
